reviewText:
Dennis is concise, simple and spot-on. I've seen this at least 100 times in 20 years, and it is still fresh each time. I couldn't have said any of it better myself. Amazing, and not what you'd expect.  Truly a gem.

There's always something new for me catch.  It's a beautiful expression of Truth, Simplicity and Love.

If at first you don't get it, watch again.  Repeat.  Dennis is _very_ down-to-earth.  You will get it, then repeat again.  Repetition, repetition, repetition is the key.  Thank you Dennis!

Dennis' teachings touch upon the heart and soul of who we are at our very core. His teachings are infused with wisdom born from experience, with a sense of humor that makes the whole spiritual trip a joy. Very highly recommended.
